subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, Christian Vande Velde crossed himself at the start line of the Tour de France, a race that a few weeks ago, he didn’t even know that he would be able to do.
snippet: On Saturday, Christian Vande Velde crossed himself at the start line of the Tour de France, a race that a few weeks ago, he didn’t even know that he would be able to do.
